general.gigTitle: develop custom hubspot website, landing page and blog template

sellerCard.description: Hi, I'm Tariq, a skilled website developer specializing in WordPress, Webflow, Shopify, and HubSpot. With years of experience in building and maintaining websites, I focus on creating custom websites that are optimized for speed, performance, and user experience. My expertise in these platforms enables me to design unique, professional, and user-friendly websites that meet the specific needs of my clients.

description.content:
As a certified HubSpot CMS developer, I specialize in delivering top-notch services to help your website achieve optimal performance.


My expertise includes:

  • Develop optimized templates for mobile, tablet, and desktop screens
  • Create various web pages using the latest theme development techniques
  • Build custom modules with drag-and-drop functionality for easy use
  • Develop forms to improve lead generation and gather customer information
  • Resolve issues with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and JQuery
  • Provide optimized and well-documented code to improve website performance
  • Conduct speed optimization for fast loading and improved user experience.



I understand that timely communication is key to providing excellent service, which is why I will be available to answer any questions you have within 1-2 hours on normal working days, and often much sooner.


Thank you for considering my services!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What kind of HubSpot issues can you fix?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I can help you with a variety of HubSpot issues, such as email template design, form creation, landing page optimization, lead scoring setup, contact management, CRM integration, and more. Just let me know what specific problems you are facing, and I will do my best to find a solution.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How long does it take to fix a HubSpot issue?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The time it takes to fix a HubSpot issue depends on the complexity of the problem. Some issues can be resolved in a matter of minutes, while others may take a few hours or even days. When you place an order, I will give you an estimate of the turnaround time based on the scope of work.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer any guarantees?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I stand behind my work and offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If for any reason you are not happy with the results, I will work with you to make it right or provide a full refund.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you communicate with clients?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I communicate with clients primarily through the Fiverr messaging system. I will keep you updated on the progress of your order and let you know if I need any additional information from you to complete the work.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What information do you need from me to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To get started, I will need access to your HubSpot account and a clear description of the issue you are facing. You can provide access to your account by adding me as a user with the appropriate level of permissions. If you have any specific requirements or preferences, please let me know in advance

reviews.comment: Tariq K. is commendable when it comes to proactive communication and swift responsiveness, making collaboration seamless. However, while the project was delivered well, there could be room for closer alignment with client expectations and more attention to details. Overall, working with Tariq K. in website development was smooth, yet slight refinements in delivery precision could enhance the experience further.
The work Tariq delivered was great! Collaboration could have been smoother with a better understanding of my requirements. But overall, Tariq is very patient and is able to solve all my issues.

Working with Tariq K. in website development was a JOY! His professionalism, code expertise, and attention to detail shine through in his impeccable work. With quick responsiveness and a deep understanding of the project, Tariq made the process smooth and easy—exactly what I needed. I'm very impressed and HIGHLY recommend him! 🙌 Thank you, Tariq!

seller_response.comment: Thank you for the detailed feedback :)

reviews.comment: Tariq is an excellent freelancer. He has created a couple of websites for us now, and although the task was complicated, he has made lots of effort to meet our needs.
Tariq K. delivered an EXCEPTIONAL website development experience. His swift responsiveness and timely delivery made collaboration a BREEZE, and I couldn’t be happier with the results. 👏
